definition: to make up (one's face)/to dress/(of one's dress) beautiful

sentences.english: Will not damage car finish, so your car is beautiful as new.
sentences.chinese: 決不損傷汽車漆面，令您的愛車靚麗如新。

sentences.english: They had full pelts of dark fur, no salt-and-peppershadings.
sentences.chinese: 它們皮毛烏黑靚麗，沒有一絲花白的跡象。

sentences.english: The pretty young face's mystery, the rowing motion dispels wrinkles the collagen membrane.
sentences.chinese: 靚麗童顏的奧祕，提拉祛皺膠原菌膜。

sentences.english: Your skin feels so beautifully soft. Contains 3 masques - for a 7 day treatment.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的皮膚感覺有彈性，光澤靚麗，爲七天治療。

sentences.english: Have your pearly whites lost their luster due to teeth stains ?
sentences.chinese: 你珍珠般靚麗的牙齒是否因爲牙齒色斑而黯然失色？

sentences.english: Beautiful satin fabric. Narrow adjustable straps.
sentences.chinese: 靚麗的緞子材料，可調的細肩帶。

sentences.english: It's face to Jin Jiang Hotle, and near Funan River, therefore, the night secen is amazing.
sentences.chinese: 正對錦江賓館，臨近府河，夜景很是靚麗。

definition: to stand out from the masses (idiom)
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
lit. only one branch of the tree is thriving (idiom)/fig. to be in a league of one's own/outstanding
